title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 364.6 - Waiver of charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 364.6 - Waiver of charges

State Regulations
(a) Charges for the use of buildings and grounds may be waived by the commissioner
upon receipt of a written request from the prospective user stating the grounds
for the requested waiver. The grounds upon which a waiver request may be based
include, but are not limited to, the rendition of services to the department or
the New York State Fair by the prospective user, or that the proposed use will
benefit, either directly or indirectly, the statutorily identified objectives
of the department. (b) The director
of the State Fair may waive charges for the use of buildings and grounds at the

New York State Fairgrounds by a State or local agency or State or local
governmental entity upon receipt of a written request from the prospective
user. Notes

364.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
